channel.title: How can Edit Teleports in Mage Book Spells? need help
channel.description: How can to edit Teleports if example:i got now Varock teleport the=edgevile home, but if i need edit to varock teleport to teleporter really there varock, i try cords edit and compile, but Changes nothing? I edit in Client.java

item.title: How can Edit Teleports in Mage Book Spells? need help
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

Well if this is Project Insanity (You didn’ t say what base you were using), teleports can be edited in Config.java and ClickingButtons.java. You set up the teleport’ s coordinates in the Config class, then use the teleport’ s name in ClickingButtons. In your case, it would look like:

Config.java

public static final int VARROCK_X = 3210; public static final int VARROCK_Y = 3424;

ClickingButtons.java

c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.VARROCK_X, Config.VARROCK_Y, 0, "modern");

Read full topic
item.source: How can Edit Teleports in Mage Book Spells? need help
